title-group.article-title: APPROACHES TO SYMBOLISM IN THE WORK OF ERNEST RENAN

References to Lamartine may be found in particular in Renan's early works, the most frequent being in the Cahiers de jeunesse and L'Avenir de ia science. A reference to symbolic artistic procedure in Lamartine is discussed below, p. 120.
